name: SLOVEL
description:
A concept game to test your patience!

You must defeat every monster in the level, to do so, you need levels:

  • Don't move and every second you stay still will earn you a level
  • Wait 7 seconds and you will get 7 extra levels
  • Defeat monsters and earn money (or click the "Extra money" button for an additional and incredible +0.1 every time you press it)
  • While waiting, spend your money and buy favors. Favors can be exchanged at the end of the level for extra levels, score and money

Remember:

  • There are no checkpoints, if you die, the game restarts
  • If you wait too much, you will lose

Game is available in Windows although a Linux version is coming soon.
